name: The Older Pages: Oblivious
description:
Challenged myself to make an RPG with assets I've been meaning to try. Don't recommend learning and using assets you've never used before and force them all to work. The amount of hours I had to put into this just for it to work was terrible lmao

There was a lot of cut content due to unexpected bugs including quests and monsters. Might fix them up and chuck it in if this does well :)

Controls:

WASD - Walk

Q - Skyrim Shout (No sound effect)

F - Interact/Sit/Mount

Have fun!

Assets Used:

https://www.dafont.com/darksskyrimfont.font

Map Magic 2 Bundle: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/terrain/mapmagic-2-bundle-178682

Impact - Physics Interaction System: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/impact-physics-int...

Everyday Motion: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/everyday-motion-pack-116611

uRPG - RPG Engine: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/urpg-rpg-engine-95016

Kinematic Character Controller: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/kinematic-character-controll...

Dialogue System for Unity: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/ai/dialogue-system-for-unity-11672

Snow Mountain: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/snow-mountain-2...

Rock and Boulders 2: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/rock-and-boulders-2-6947

Puppet Master: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/puppetmaster-48977

Medieval Barrows and Wagons: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/historic/medieval-barrows-...

Final IK: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/final-ik-14290

Historical - Biblical Male Commoners: https://marketplace.reallusion.com/historical-commoners---biblical-males

The Guardian - Fantasy Armor: https://marketplace.reallusion.com/the-guardian_289565

If I've missed anything please contact me via itch.io
